mapper.delete: DELETE FROM scada_examines_c WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT dt.minno FROM ( SELECT MAX(id) AS minno FROM scada_examines_c GROUP BY produce_id,meter_n, result ) dt )
mapper.select:
SELECT product.sn productSN, produce.sn produceSN, examines_c.* FROM scada_examines_c examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON plan.id = produce.plan_id LEFT JOIN scada_product product ON product.id = plan.product_id
${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT product.sn productSN, produce.sn produceSN, examines_c.* FROM scada_examines_c examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON plan.id = produce.plan_id LEFT JOIN scada_product product ON product.id = plan.product_id
${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT examines.collect_date_t collect_date, examines.plan_sn, examines.product_sn, count( examines.id ) tocal_count, ( SELECT count( examines_produce_count.produce_sn ) FROM ( SELECT examines.plan_sn, examines.produce_sn, count( examines.id ) FROM ( SELECT plan.sn plan_sn, produce.sn produce_sn, examines_c.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM scada_examines_c WHERE date( collect_date ) = #{collectDate} ) examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON produce.plan_id = plan.id ) examines GROUP BY examines.produce_sn, examines.plan_sn ) examines_produce_count WHERE examines_produce_count.plan_sn = examines.plan_sn ) produce_count, ( SELECT count( examines_produce_count.produce_sn ) FROM ( SELECT examines.plan_sn, examines.produce_sn, count( examines.id ) FROM ( SELECT plan.sn plan_sn, produce.sn produce_sn, examines_c.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM scada_examines_c WHERE date( collect_date ) = #{collectDate} and (result is null or result != 'PASS') ) examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON produce.plan_id = plan.id ) examines GROUP BY examines.produce_sn, examines.plan_sn ) examines_produce_count WHERE examines_produce_count.plan_sn = examines.plan_sn ) produce_error FROM ( SELECT plan.sn plan_sn, produce.sn produce_sn, product.sn product_sn, date( examines_c.collect_date ) collect_date_t, examines_c.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM scada_examines_c WHERE date( collect_date ) = #{collectDate} ) examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON produce.plan_id = plan.id left join scada_product product on plan.product_id = product.id ) examines GROUP BY examines.plan_sn, examines.product_sn, examines.collect_date_t

SELECT examines.collect_date_t collect_date, examines.plan_sn, examines.product_sn, count( examines.id ) tocal_count, ( SELECT count( examines_produce_count.produce_sn ) FROM ( SELECT examines.plan_sn, examines.produce_sn, count( examines.id ) FROM ( SELECT plan.sn plan_sn, produce.sn produce_sn, examines_c.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM scada_examines_c WHERE (`collect_date` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) ) examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON produce.plan_id = plan.id ) examines GROUP BY examines.produce_sn, examines.plan_sn ) examines_produce_count WHERE examines_produce_count.plan_sn = examines.plan_sn ) produce_count, ( SELECT count( examines_produce_count.produce_sn ) FROM ( SELECT examines.plan_sn, examines.produce_sn, count( examines.id ) FROM ( SELECT plan.sn plan_sn, produce.sn produce_sn, examines_c.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM scada_examines_c WHERE (`collect_date` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) and (result is null or result != 'PASS') ) examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON produce.plan_id = plan.id ) examines GROUP BY examines.produce_sn, examines.plan_sn ) examines_produce_count WHERE examines_produce_count.plan_sn = examines.plan_sn ) produce_error FROM ( SELECT plan.sn plan_sn, produce.sn produce_sn, product.sn product_sn, date( examines_c.collect_date ) collect_date_t, examines_c.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM scada_examines_c WHERE (`collect_date` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) ) examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON produce.plan_id = plan.id left join scada_product product on plan.product_id = product.id ) examines GROUP BY examines.plan_sn, examines.product_sn, examines.collect_date_t

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT date( examines.collect_date ) collect_date, examines.plan_sn, examines.product_sn, count( examines.id ) tocal_count, ( SELECT count( examines_produce_count.produce_sn ) FROM ( SELECT examines.plan_sn, examines.produce_sn, count( examines.id ) FROM ( SELECT plan.sn plan_sn, produce.sn produce_sn, examines_c.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM scada_examines_c WHERE (`collect_date` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) ) examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON produce.plan_id = plan.id ) examines GROUP BY examines.produce_sn ) examines_produce_count WHERE examines_produce_count.plan_sn = examines.plan_sn ) produce_count, ( SELECT count( examines_produce_count.produce_sn ) FROM ( SELECT examines.plan_sn, examines.produce_sn, count( examines.id ) FROM ( SELECT plan.sn plan_sn, produce.sn produce_sn, examines_c.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM scada_examines_c WHERE (`collect_date` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) and (result is null or result != 'PASS') ) examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON produce.plan_id = plan.id ) examines GROUP BY examines.produce_sn ) examines_produce_count WHERE examines_produce_count.plan_sn = examines.plan_sn ) produce_error FROM ( SELECT plan.sn plan_sn, produce.sn produce_sn, product.sn product_sn, examines_c.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM scada_examines_c WHERE (`collect_date` BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) ) examines_c LEFT JOIN scada_produce produce ON examines_c.produce_id = produce.id LEFT JOIN scada_plan plan ON produce.plan_id = plan.id left join scada_product product on plan.product_id = product.id ) examines GROUP BY examines.plan_sn ) qualityExaminesVO
${ew.sqlSegment}
